mapper.select: select * from( select rownum rnum, member.* from( select * from member order by M_ID asc) member) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 10+1) and rnum <= (#{page} * 10)
select * from( select rownum rnum, board.* from( select * from board order by B_NUM desc) board) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 10+1) and rnum <= (#{page} * 10)
select * from( select rownum rnum, comments.* from( select * from Comments order by C_NUM desc) comments) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 10+1) and rnum <= (#{page} * 10)
